name: CatHotel VR: Fur-tual Reality
description:
You've always dreamed of your very own hotel for cute cats, but your wish never came true? Your wait is now over, because with CatHotel VR you experience all different kinds and breeds of kitties, play with them and care for them.


Cute cats in Virtual Reality
Open your own hotel for cats and care for lots of different breeds and kinds of kitties! As the head of your cattery, you need to make sure that your guests don't want for anything. So it's important to always remember to feed and play with your cats. If you do, each kitty will soon feel happy and content!


Care for your kitties in your own cattery
Thanks to Google Cardboard, you can now observe and cuddle 7 different breeds of cat in Virtual Reality up close. With their own beds, bowls and enough wool to play with, you can fulfill every wish of your protégés. Explore the beautifully decorated lobby and relax in your very own cat hotel.


Cute game graphics from 3 different perspectives
As the head of the cattery, it's important that you treat all your cats equally well. Feed your little ones, play with the cat teaser toy and watch them play with each other. Relax in your lovingly designed hotel and enjoy the calm and the playful games of your kitties.


★ Observe your cats playing with each other
★ Care for your kitties and play with them
★ Relax in your beautifully decorated lobby
★ Meet 7 different breeds
★ Give each cat their own bed and bowls to make them happy


So what are you waiting for? Let's go to the virtual CatHotel!

Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile
